docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 16. -- Women's rights registered probably their most notable single triumph in history today when the Pan-American Conference voted to submit to its members a treaty guaranteeing equal nationality rights and to recommend that all...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 16. -- Women's rights registered probably their most notable single triumph in history today when the Pan-American Conference voted to submit to its members a treaty guaranteeing equal nationality rights and to recommend that all countries grant equal civil and political rights as soon as possible.
docs.abstract: Pan Amer Conf adopts treaty guaranteeing women's nationality rights and votes to continue existence of Comm; U S attitude on continuance of Comm

headline.main: WOMEN VICTORIOUS IN EQUALITY FIGHT AT MONTEVIDEO; Pan-American Parley Adopts Treaty Guaranteeing Their Nationality Rights. CIVIL PARITY ALSO URGED Several Nations Pledge Action on Political Status -- Eleven to Sign Citizenship Pact. WOMEN VICTORIOUS IN EQUALITY FIGHT

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 16. -- Operating with the precision of a welloiled machine, the seventh Pan-American Conference met in plenary session this afternoon and rubber-stamped in rapid succession eleven matters which had previously been studied, debated...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 16. -- Operating with the precision of a welloiled machine, the seventh Pan-American Conference met in plenary session this afternoon and rubber-stamped in rapid succession eleven matters which had previously been studied, debated and approved by committees.
docs.abstract: Casts Colombia's vote in favor of Lima, Peru, as site of next Pan Amer Conf

byline.original: Special Correspondence, THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: The dollar showed a fractional recovery last week, based on the quotation for the French franc. After an opening low of 63.19 cents, established on Monday, there was a sharp rally to 65.38, on Wednesday, the highest since November 1. A reaction...
docs.lead_paragraph: The dollar showed a fractional recovery last week, based on the quotation for the French franc. After an opening low of 63.19 cents, established on Monday, there was a sharp rally to 65.38, on Wednesday, the highest since November 1. A reaction followed from this point to 63.76, on Saturday, but on balance there was a net gain of .31 cent on the week. Range a year ago, 100.43@100.29 cents.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 17 -- A meeting of the foreign ministers and chairman of delegations at the Pan-American Conference has been called for tomorrow to hear Secretary of State Hull's exposition of why the United States is unwilling to back up any acts...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 17 -- A meeting of the foreign ministers and chairman of delegations at the Pan-American Conference has been called for tomorrow to hear Secretary of State Hull's exposition of why the United States is unwilling to back up any acts of force that may be authorized by the League of Nations toward the solution of the Chaco War.
docs.abstract: Pan Amer Conf meeting called to hear U S policy on League action

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 17 -- Swinging into the third and probably the last week of the seventh Pan-American Conference, the delegates felt today that the most important objects of the conference had been disposed of at yesterday's plenary session.

headline.main: HULL TO BE FACED WITH VEXING ISSUES; Intervention and Recognition Plans of Cuba to Arise in Last Week at Montevideo. AGGRESSOR TO BE DEFINED Project Provides for Action by Neutrals to End Conflicts in Western Hemisphere.

byline.original: By JOHN W. WHITE.Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: LA PAZ, Bolivia, Dec. 18 -- "Concrete points" for solution of the Chaco conflict have been agreed upon by the Bolivian Government and the League of Nations Peace Commission here, it was reliably stated here today.
docs.lead_paragraph: LA PAZ, Bolivia, Dec. 18 -- "Concrete points" for solution of the Chaco conflict have been agreed upon by the Bolivian Government and the League of Nations Peace Commission here, it was reliably stated here today.
docs.abstract: League group to leave La Paz; quarrel is 100 yrs old

headline.main: League Group to Leave La Paz.

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Tuesday, Dec. 19 -- An armistice has been arranged in the Chaco war between Bolivia and Paraguay, which has cost the two countries more than 100,000 casualties in the past year and a half.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Tuesday, Dec. 19 -- An armistice has been arranged in the Chaco war between Bolivia and Paraguay, which has cost the two countries more than 100,000 casualties in the past year and a half.
docs.abstract: Truce arranged until end of yr

headline.main: TRUCE IS ARRANGED IN THE CHACO WAR UNTIL END OF YEAR; Paraguay Offers and Bolivia Accepts Armistice to Negotiate Peace. URUGUAY AS THE MEDIATOR Acting for the Pan-American Conference, Chairman Mane Brings Halt to Fighting. TRUCE IS ARRANGED IN THE CHACO WAR
